name: spx-class-toggle
description: Toggle CSS classes on any element in the document.

properties.name: local
properties.description: Specify a local storage item, so the toggle state will be remembered when the user visits the site again.

properties.name: target
properties.description: Target element. Can take any querySelector value. (id, class, tag etc.) If none is set it will default to the first element inside.

properties.name: toggle
properties.description: List of classes that should be toggled.
